name: Space Gems (Calexper)
description:
SPACE GEMS is a 2D endless runner where you break blocks to find hidden gems and increase your game Score. There are also several spawning gems across the Galaxy that have different effects.

How to Play: 

-Alternate between the several Ammo types using the Mouse Wheel/Tab Key or corresponding number keys.

-Move your ship by using Arrow Keys or WASD Keys on your keyboard.

-Shoot using your left Mouse button.

You can also play the game on UNITY PLAY via this link:

https://play.unity.com/mg/other/unity-games-429
